REF AIP LSGG AD 2.7 SEASONAL AVAILABILITY - CLEARING REMARKS SHALL READ: SNOW REMOVAL ASSURED RWY 04/22 DE-ICED / ANTI-ICED WITH KFOR (POTASSIUM FORMATE FLUIDS) OR WITH NAFO (SODIUM FORMATE SOLIDS) IN CASE OF SNOW, EXPECT UP TO 40 MINUTES RWY CLOSURE FOR STANDARD SNOW REMOVAL PROCEDURE.

AIRCRAFT PROCEDURES IN REDUCED VISIBILITY CONDITIONS (AWO). A) CRITERIA FOR INITIATION OF LVP (LOW VISIBILITY PROCEDURES): LVP WILL BE IN FORCE WHEN: -RVR IS LESS THAN 550M, AND/OR -CLOUD BASE HEIGHT IS BELOW 200FT ACCORDING TO THE METEOROLOGICAL LOCAL REPORT, AND/OR -THE DETERIORATION OF WEATHER CONDITIONS RECOMMENDS DOING SO. REF AIP AD2 LIMF 1-20 ITEM 20 PARAGRAPH 4 POINT 4.1 B) IN CASE OF REDUCED AERODROME VISIBILITY CONDITIONS A REDUCED MOVEMENTS RATE CAN BE EXPECTED: -APPROXIMATELY 15 ARRIVALS PER HOUR ARE ALLOWED IF LVP ARE IN FORCE, -APPROXIMATELY 12 ARRIVALS PER HOUR ARE ALLOWED IF RVR LOWER THAN 400M AND RVR GREATER THAN 75M, -APPROXIMATELY 5 ARRIVALS PER HOUR ARE ALLOWED IF SFC SURVEILLANCE SYS OR STOP BAR G OR STOP BAR Y1 IS OUT OF SERVICE OR RVR EQUAL 75M REF AIP AD2 LIMF 1-20 ITEM 20 PARAGRAPH 4 POINT 4.2 C) LDG AND DEP ACFT ROUTINGS TO/FM LEONARDO SOUTH APRON DELETED REF AIP AD2 LIMF 2-5 'LOW VISIBILITY PROCEDURES CHART'

MULTILATERATION SYSTEM (MLAT). TURIN AIRPORT IS EQUIPPED WITH ADVANCED SURFACE MOVEMENT GROUND CONTROL SYSTEM (A-SMGCS) ENABLING AIRCRAFT TO BE TRACKED BY ATC OVER THE MOVEMENT AREA H24 AND IN ALL WEATHER CONDITIONS. PILOTS SHALL OPERATE THEIR TRANSPONDER ACCORDING TO AIP ITALIA ENR 1.6 REF AIP AD2 1-18 'LOCAL AERODROME REGULATIONS' POINT 6 'LOCAL FLIGHT RESTRICTIONS'

RADIO FAILURE ON MANOEUVRING AREA. DEPARTING AIRCRAFT: CONTINUE ON THE ASSIGNED ROUTE, UP TO THE LIMIT OF THE AUTHORIZATION RECEIVED WHILE WAITING FOR THE ARRIVAL OF THE FOLLOW-ME TO REACH THE PARKING STAND. ARRIVING AIRCRAFT: - IF PILOT HAS ALREADY RECEIVED INSTRUCTIONS TO TAXI, CONTINUE ON THE ASSIGNED ROUTE, UP TO THE LIMIT OF THE AUTHORIZATION RECEIVED, WHERE HE WILL WAIT FOR THE FOLLOW-ME FOR PARKING OR, IF PILOT HAS BEEN INSTRUCTED TO REACH IT, TO THE STAND - IF THE FAILURE OCCURS IN FLIGHT OR IN ANY CASE NO TAXIING INSTRUCTIONS HAVE BEEN RECEIVED: A) IF THE LANDING TAKES PLACE FOR RWY 36, PILOT WILL CLEAR THE RUNWAY VIA TWY A OR TWY B, AND WILL TAXI TO Y3 WHERE IT WILL WAIT FOR THE FOLLOW ME B) IF THE LANDING WILL TAKE PLACE FOR RWY 18 PILOT WILL CLEAR THE TWY G AND STOP AT THE RUNWAY HOLDING POINT (RHP) WHERE IT WILL WAIT FOR THE FOLLOW ME IN THAT POSITION. C) IN THE EVENT OF UNAVAILABILITY OF THE TAXIWAY(S) AND/OR THE IDENTIFIED ROUTE(S), PILOT MUST STOP ON THE RUNWAY REF AIP AD2 LIMF 2.20 'LOCAL AERODROME REGULATIONS' POINT 8 'RADIO FAILURE ON MANOEUVRING AREA'

IN CASE OF REDUCED AERODROME VISIBILITY CONDITIONS, IN ORDER TO ENSURE SEPARATION IN THE MANOEUVRING AREA BETWEEN SUCCESSIVE TAXIING AIRCRAFT, GROUND MOVEMENT WILL BE IMPLEMENTED BASED ON BLOCK PATHS DELIMITED BY IHP (INTERMEDIATE HLDG PSN) Y1, Y2 AND Y3, WITH A POSSIBLE REDUCTION IN AIRPORT CAPACITY. A. FOLLOW-ME ASSISTANCE IS MANDATORY: - ON KILO APRON WHEN RVR VALUE, AT ANY POINT, IS LESS THAN 400M - ON MAIN APRON AND ON GENERAL AVIATION APRON WHEN THE RVR VALUE AT TDZ IS LESS THAN 550M OR WHEN THAN RVR VALUE, AT ANY POINT, IS LESS THAN 400M. B. MANDATORY REPORTS. IN REDUCED VISIBILITY CONDITIONS ALL PILOTS SHALL REPORT TO TORINO TWR: - REACHING RHP (RUNWAY HLDG PSN)/IHP, UNLESS OTHERWISE INSTRUCTED BY TWR - RUNWAY VACATED WHEN ILS SENSITIVE AREA HAS BEEN VACATED AS IDENTIFIED BY THE END OF THE GREEN/YELLOW COLOUR CODED TWY CENTERLINE LIGHTS - REACHING THE ASSIGNED PARKING STAND. C. TAXING ROUTES ARE DESCRIBED IN LVP CHART. D. FURTHER INFORMATION AVAILABLE ON LVP CHART AND AERODROME CHART. REF AIP AD 2 LIMF 2.20 'LOCAL AERODROME REGULATIONS' POINT 4 'AIRCRAFT PROCEDURES IN REDUCED VISIBILITY CONDITIONS (AWO)' POINT 4.5 'GROUND MOVEMENT (REF. LVP CHART)'

AIRCRAFT NOT 8.33KHZ CHANNEL SPACING CAPABLE : READ : ON DEPARTURE, AIRCRAFT NOT EQUIPPED WITH A RADIOCOMMUNICATION DEVICE COMPATIBLE WITH 8.33KHZ CHANNEL SPACING SHALL CONTACT ATS ON BALE TWR FREQ 118.300MHZ. ON ARRIVAL, UNLESS OTHERWISE INSTRUCTED BY ATS, THE AIRCRAFT NOT EQUIPPED WITH A RADIOCOMMUNICATION DEVICE COMPATIBLE WITH 8.33KHZ CHANNEL SPACING SHALL CONTACT ON BALE APP FREQ130.900MHZ FROM GROUND TO FL145. SX0142/24 AIP SUPPLEMENT LFKB/BASTIA/PORETTA MODIFICATION OF THE GA BUSINESS AVIATION PRKG PLAN VALIDITY: 08AUG24-23JAN25 REPOSITIONING OF STANDS IN THE GEN AND BUSINESS AVIATION PRKG AREAS, AS WELL AS THE REOPENING OF ACFT STANDS IN THE COMMERCIAL AVIATION PRKG AREA. DAY AND NGT MARKING OF THE NEUTRALIZED ZONE IS ESTABLISHED IN ACCORDANCE WITH CURRENT REGULATORY PROVISIONS. UNAVAILABLE INFRASTRUCTURES: - CLOSURE OF STANDS B14, B15, B16, C36, C35, C34, C33, C26, C25, C24, C23, C12, C13, D9, D10, D11, D16. ACFT STANDS: - CREATION OF 33 ACFT PRKG STANDS: B2, B4, B6, B8, B10, B11, B12, B13, B14, B15, B16, B17, B18, B20, B22, B24, B26, B28, C21, C23, C25, C27, C31, C33, C35, D40, D41, D43, D45, D50, D57, D59, D60. - REOPENING OF ACFT STANDS A6, A7, A8, A9, A10. THE DATE AND TIME OF ACT FOR THE NEW PRKG STANDS WILL BE ANNOUNCED BY NOTAM.

DEPARTURE FLIGHTS MODIFIED : THE NICE COTE D'AZUR AIRPORT ESTABLISHES A PERMANENT AND AUTOMATIC DATA EXCHANGE WITH THE NETWORK MANAGEMENT OPERATIONS CENTRE AS AN 'ANI' AIRPORT (ADVANCED NETWORK INTEGRATED), IN ADDITION TO THE EXISTING 'ACDM' (AIRPORT COLLABORATIVE DECISION MAKING) MESSAGE EXCHANGE. AN 'ANI' AIRPORT HAS FULLY ADOPTED THE AIRPORT-'CDM' (COLLABORATIVE DECISION MAKING) CONCEPT BY PROVIDING TO 'NMOC' THE FULL SET OF 'DPI' MESSAGES (DEPARTURE PLANNING INFORMATION: 'PDPI, EDPI, TDPIT, TDPIS, ADPI AND CDPI') AND 'GAPI' MESSAGES (GENERAL ARRIVAL PLANNING INFORMATION). THIS ACTIVATION ADDITIONALLY COVERS THE INTEGRATION OF NEW 'TTOT' VALUES ('TTTOT, ETTOT, CTTOT') IN 'EDPI', 'TDPIT', 'TDPIS' MESSAGES. WITH THE INTRODUCTION OF 'PDPI', NEW VALUES IN 'DPI' AND 'GAPI' MESSAGES EXCHANGES WITH EUROCONTROL SYSTEMS, THE ATFM NETWORK MAY BE IMPACTED AS EARLY AS 48 HOURS BEFORE EOBT AND MAY BE USED FOR AIR TRAFFIC FLOW MANAGEMENT (ATFM) PURPOSES. REF AIP AD2 LFMN.22.4

#0122/24 CHART NOTAMN Q) LIMC/QFACX/LBT A) LIMC B) 2412190000 C) 2501012359 E) AOI DCL: REF AIC A07/24 DCL AVBL NO EARLIER THAN 40 MINUTES BEFORE EOBT. IF A DIFFERENT DEP RWY NEEDED, USE RCD FREE TEXT BOX, E.G: REQ 35R. IF NO CLR DLV MESSAGE RECEIVED, CTC DLV TO VERIFY REQUEST. RESPOND WITH DEP CLR READBACK DOWNLINK MESSAGE (CDA) WITHIN 5MIN OF RECEIPT OF CLR DLV MESSAGE. UPON RECEIPT OF ANY -REVERT TO VOICE PROCEDURES- MESSAGE, PIC SHALL CANCEL ANY PREVIOUSLY RECEIVED CLEARANCE AND FOLLOW THE EXISTING VOICE PROCEDURES FOR CLEARANCE REQUEST. PIC SHALL MONITOR THE CLR DLV FREQ ONCE DCL PROCESS IS INITIATED. PILOTS SHOULD FOLLOW A-CDM PROCEDURES, IF DEP CLR RECEIVED VIA DATALINK, IN PARTICULAR: - DEP TRAFFIC MUST BE -READY- WITHIN TOBT +5MIN - WHEN ARDT RECEIVED, DEP ACFT SHALL MONITOR MALPENSA DLV, IN ORDER TO RECEIVE START-UP APPROVAL ACCORDING TO TSAT AND CURRENT TRAFFIC SITUATION.

GLIDER RWY 02L/20R DOWNGRADED TO PLANE RWY.

FOR OVERFLIGHTS OR ARRIVALS, LOGON MUST BE INITIATED BY THE PILOT, WITH SUFFICIENT NOTICE (BETWEEN 10 AND 25 MINUTES BEFORE ENTERING THE CRNA), TO ENSURE THAT THE CONNECTION IS ESTABLISHED, AND WITH THE FIRST FRENCH ACC CROSSED. IF LOGON HAS ALREADY BEEN ESTABLISHED WITH AN ADJACENT UPSTREAM ACC PROVIDING LOGON FORWARD, OR IF FORWARD HAS FAILED, ADVANCE NOTICE IS NOT REQUIRED. FOR FLIGHTS DEPARTING FROM FRENCH AIRFIELDS, LOGON MUST BE INITIATED NO LATER THAN CROSSING FL150. IF LOGON IS IMPOSSIBLE FOR A TECHNICAL REASON KNOWN OR UNKNOWN TO THE E PILOT, THE CREW WILL ANNOUNCE 'UNABLE CPDLC'. REFERENCE AIP FRANCE GEN 3.4-9.
CPDLC RESTRICTIONS : PILOT MESSAGE REQUESTS (DM REQUEST) NOT ACCEPTED WITHIN LFFF UAC
MILITARY FIRING AREA /CLOU NEF-W AOSTA/ ACT REF AIP ENR 5.2.1.1-1

IAS RESTRICTIONS SID 17L/17R AND SID 35L/35R : WAYPOINT LL795 : READ MAX IAS 210KT INSTEAD OF 230KT. WAYPOINT LL597 : READ MAX IAS 230KT. Paragraph.Text: -FREE ROUTE AIRSPACE FRANCE - EAST CELL (LFFRAE) - AMENDMENT OF THE FRA RELEVANCE OF THE FOLLOWING SIGNIFICANT POINTS AND NAVAIDS. READ: -GTQ = FRA(I): LFFRAE/ FRA(A): LFEP,LFEV,LFGA,LFGF,LFGL,LFGJ,LFGQ,LFLH,LFOK,LFQB,LFQM,LFQW,LFSA, LFSD ,LFSI,LFSM,LFST,LFSX / FRA(D): EDDK,EDFH,EDSB,EDTL,ELLX,LFST,LFGA -LUL = FRA (I): LFFRAE / FRA(A): LFEP, LFGF, LFGJ ,LFGL ,LFGQ ,LFGW ,LFGY LFJL,LFJY ,LFLH ,LFOK ,LFQB ,LFQE ,LFSD ,LFSG ,LFSI ,LFSN ,LFSO ,LFST,EDSB,EDTL / FRA(D): LFEV,LFGB,LFQM,LFQW,LFSB,LFSM,LFSX,LSGC,LSGK,LSMA,LSME,LSMP,LSZB, LSZC ,LSZG -MIRGU = FRA(I): LFFRAE / FRA(D): EDSB,EDTL,ETAR -MOROK = FRA(I): LFFRAE / FRA(A): LFHJ ,LFHM ,LFHN ,LFHS ,LFHU LFHV ,LFHW ,LFKA ,LFKL ,LFKX LFKY ,LFLB LFLE LFLG ,LFLI ,LFLJ ,LFLL ,LFLM ,LFLP,LFLS,LFLU,LFLY,LFMH,LFXA,LSGG,LSGL,LSGP / FRA(D): LFGB,LFSB,LFSM,LSMD,LSZH,LFST,LFQP,LFGA -PENDU = FRA(I): LFFRAE / FRA(D): LFGA,LFGB,LFSB -ERADI: FRA(X) REF ENR 2.2.5

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: KARLSRUHE UAC USES THE EUROCONTROL LOGON LIST TO STABILIZE CPDLC PERFORMANCE. ALL LOGON LISTED ACFT SHALL LOG ON TO KARLSRUHE UAC. DATA LINK ADDRESS OF KARLSRUHE UAC IS EDUU. NOT LOGON LISTED ACFT SHALL NOT TRY TO LOGON TO EDUU. LOGON FORWARDING FOR NOT LOGON LISTED ACFT WILL NOT BE PERFORMED. ALL OPERATORS ARE INVITED TO APPLY FOR LOGON LIST ENTRY VIA THE PUBLISHED EUROCONTROL PROCESS (AIP GERMANY PAGES GEN 3.4-70 THRU GEN 3.4-75 REFER).

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: NDB MB 330KHZ U/S.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: FOR EN-ROUTE OPERATIONS THE RESPECTIVE VOR SHALL BE SELECTED FOR NAVIGATION INSTEAD OF THE NDB IN CASE OF HOMONYMOUS IDENTIFIERS. THIS APPLIES TO KFT. FLIGHT CREWS ARE ADVISED TO MONITOR THE CORRECT SELECTION OF THE VOR FOR EN-ROUTE OPERATIONS. IN CASE THE USAGE OF THE RESPECTIVE NDB IS REQUIRED, ATC SHALL BE INFORMED UPON INITIAL CONTACT.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: REF AIP AUSTRIA, GEN 3.4 ITEM 3.4. INCREASED CPDLC USAGE WILL BE ENDEAVOURED BY ATC IN THE AREA OF RESPONSIBILITY OF ACC WIEN AND APP LOWW. ALL DATA LINK EQUIPPED AIRCRAFT (CPDLC ATN VDL MODE 2) ARE REQUESTED TO LOG ON TO ACC WIEN / APP WIEN. THE DATA LINK ADDRESS FOR ACC WIEN/ APP WIEN IS LOVV. FLIGHT CREWS SHALL EXPECT TO RECEIVE UPLINK MESSAGES ESPECIALLY IN SITUATIONS OF HIGH RTF FREQUENCY LOAD AND ARE REQUESTED TO REACT TO THEM ASAP.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)

Paragraph.Text: RESTRICTED AREA EDR207W (TRA ALLGAEU 2) DEACTIVATED.

lsya:BriefingSection.sectionName: EXTENDED AREA AROUND DESTINATION ALTERNATE AIRPORT(S)
